views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

ShazAnimTagLESS is a Tiny Tweak that Allows to Remove the Animations and Buttons Layer when Launching the Shazam Application and during its Tagging Feature!

ShazAnimTagLESS Brings Better Minimalistic Users Experience Improving the Way of Songs Tagging and the Using of Shazam!

In Case, you have to Tap in the Area where natively the Tag Button was in Order to Start to Sing a Song :-)

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository (if you Have got that Version, Just Uninstall it and Install this New one).

No options to Configure.

See Screenshots below about How It Was Before and After.

Thanks @karimouni24 for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.2
- Added Support for arm64e/A12 Devices.
